Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides with symmetric structures against multidrug-resistant bacteria while alleviating antimicrobial resistance.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, Zhang F, Yao J, Zhu Y, Zhu N, Zhang Y, Liu H, Gou S, Ni N

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=256 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:15% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli 780(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli 804(MIC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 9931(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 97830(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 50(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 73(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus 113(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µM)
